DOC.brief_summary: LTBI Treatment is effective in prison
DOC.brief_title: Active Screening of Latent TB Infection, Treatment and Long Term Follow-up in Prison
DOC.detailed_description: LTBI treatment will be conducted in a prison with either isoniazid or rifampin
DOC.criteria: all people who is LTBI, and have ability to sign the informed concent previously adverse effect from antiTB medication complete treatment of TB in the pass; active TB AST, ALT > 3 times of normal limit platelet < 150 k/mm3 Tbil > 2 times of normal limit
